scripts.build: pnpm --filter @code-launcher/client-with-vite run build && pnpm --filter @code-launcher/server-with-fastify run build
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run build && cp packages/publish/package.json build/package.json && cp README.md build/REDME.md
scripts.publish:custom: pnpm run prepublishOnly && cd build && npm pack && npm publish
